head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VAUGHAN, AUSTIN B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VAUGHAN, AUSTIN B.

block.p: VAUGHAN-Austin B., Most Reverend, D.D., S.T.D., Auxiliary Bishop of New York, Vicar of Orange County, former Professor and Rector of St. Joseph's Seminary. Beloved brother of Mae Murphy and the late John Vaughan. Dear brother-in-law of Margaret Vaughan. Loving uncle of Eileen Collins, Marie McKeon, Charles Murphy, Nancy McCorry and John Vaughan. Cousin of Msgr. John Considine. Also survived by 27 grand-nieces and nephews. Reception of the Body at St. Patrick's Cathedral, Tuesday, June 27th, 12 noon. Reposing thereafter in Our Lady's Chapel until Thursday, June 29th. A Mass of Christian Burial is at 12 noon, Main Altar of St. Patrick's Cathedral. Interment is to follow at the Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. For further information, please call Frank E. Campbell-The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue, NY, New York. 212-288-3500.

Beloved brother of Mae Murphy and the late John Vaughan. Dear brother-in-law of Margaret Vaughan. Loving uncle of Eileen Collins, Marie McKeon, Charles Murphy, Nancy McCorry and John Vaughan. Cousin of Msgr. John Considine. Also survived by 27 grand-nieces and nephews. Reception of the Body at St. Patrick's Cathedral, Tuesday, June 27th, 12 noon. Reposing thereafter in Our Lady's Chapel until Thursday, June 29th. A Mass of Christian Burial is at 12 noon, Main Altar of St. Patrick's Cathedral. Interment is to follow at the Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Hawthorne, NY. For further information, please call Frank E. Campbell-The Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue, NY, New York. 212-288-3500.
